Chancellor and his sign of the highest mafioso of German imperialism, "the godfather" Olaf Scholz, has on Tuesday, 12. March 2024, in this context the Filipino President in Berlin met .

Briefly about the story: Marco's father, Ferdinand Marcos, was from 1965 to 1986 when the Yankees dropped him, President of the Philippines, a very bad murderer of the Filipino people. Marcos Jr. also married in the influential Araneta family. Marcos Jr. had already held important offices at the time of the regime, which was led by his father and urged his father to attack the "Camp Crame", in which hundreds of thousands of civilians during the "People Power Revolution" uprising against Marcos Sen. CNN reported a few years ago .

The planned long -term stationing of Canadian and British troops and arms deliveries known and condemned. The current trip to Europe also serves the confrontation of Yankees with Chinese social imperialism.

In contrast to Australia, where Marcos Jr. himself felt headwind for his crimes in parliament, he was Reception in Germany warmly . The federal government celebrates the cooperation and calls the Philippines "important partners for Germany in Southeast Asia". One now wants to continue in the economic sector, in particular state German investment guarantees for the capital export of German imperialism are to be expanded, said Chancellor Scholz. The goal is a free trade agreement between the EU and the Philippines, but also the other Asean countries. At the same time, German imperialism strives for cheap workers from the Philippines, especially women in the health sector.

In one common Presse conference Scholz spoke, among other things, about Filipino, "which are important for the European and German economy, for example". Marcos Jr. spoke more about military aspects of the meeting. He underlined that "Germany has helped my country's armed forces since 1974". Germany is thus the “second oldest formal formal defense partner of the Philippines, and I have expressed the openness of my government in terms of discussions about a collaboration that concerns goes beyond training And also areas such as cyber and maritime areas ”. The construction of capacities and skills of the coast guard by Germany was also requested. On request, Marcos Jr. Underlined: “We also have an intensive exchange with the Federal Republic of Germany in the field of training of the armed forces and the coast guard of my country. We agreed with the Federal Chancellor that we want to expand that "He also did not miss the opportunity to invite German imperialist monopolies such as Siemens, Lufthansa, Deutsche Bank, Bayer, Bosch to loot the Philippines.

German imperialism will therefore promote the exploitation and oppression of the Filipino people in its favor. It is clear and yet deeply judged that a mafioso, such as Schloz, and a murderer, such as Marcos, share such efforts. Such is neither in the interests of the people in Germany nor the Philippines, but diametrically opposed. The revolutionaries in this country have to deceive themselves and fight it, not only with beautiful words, but in concrete deeds, firmly united with the Filipino people and their struggle, everything else would be smooth.
